title: Wall Street Breakfast August 13: U.S. Likely To Follow Global Stocks Lower As Turkish Lira Tumbles
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Our top stories today: U.S. likely to follow global stocks lower as Turkish lira tumbles; North and South Korea to meet next month in pursuit of more economic cooperation; and earnings season winds down with a few more big names to report this week.
